name: Burg_417
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect dominant with Coastal Tongue loanwords
diet heavy on salted and smoked fish
tide-and-harbor festivals tie communal obligations to ritual magic use
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magic
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: tech baseline near-medieval with localized ritual tech reliance
navigational auguries used but seamanship still required
